00028 #ifndef ABSTRACTCELLBASEDTESTSUITE_HPP_
00029 #define ABSTRACTCELLBASEDTESTSUITE_HPP_
00030 #define CXXTEST_ABORT_TEST_ON_FAIL
00031 
00032 #include "SimulationTime.hpp"
00033 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00034 #include "CellPropertyRegistry.hpp"
00035 
00041 class AbstractCellBasedTestSuite : public CxxTest::TestSuite
00042 {
00043 protected:
00044 
00048     void setUp()
00049     {
00050         //The following won't work.  It returns from this setup method, but not the test suite
00051         //EXIT_IF_PARALLEL; // defined in PetscTools
00052 
00053         SimulationTime::Instance()->SetStartTime(0.0);
00054         RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->Reseed(0);
00055         CellPropertyRegistry::Instance()->Clear();
00056     }
00057 
00061     void tearDown()
00062     {
00063         SimulationTime::Destroy();
00064         RandomNumberGenerator::Destroy();
00065     }
00066 };
00067
